mapper.select: SELECT m.perms FROM `sys_user` AS u INNER JOIN user_role_relation AS ur ON u.id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN role AS r ON r.id = ur.role_id INNER JOIN role_menu_relation AS rp ON r.id = rp.role_id INNER JOIN sys_menu as m ON rp.menu_id = m.id WHERE u.id = #{id}
SELECT r.role_name FROM `sys_user` AS u INNER JOIN user_role_relation AS ur ON u.id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN role AS r ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE u.id =#{id}
